about_the_game:
Run to the hills and experience the hefty power of modern American diesel! Tackle the tough terrain of Californian canyons with the Antelope Valley Line, between the sprawling Los Angeles cityscape and desert bushes of Lancaster in almighty Metrolink traction. West Coast rails are yours to explore in Train Sim World 4!

Open the throttle and embark on Metrolink commuter services with their sleek and unique F125 diesel fleet. The F125 “Spirit”, first built in 2015, marked a return to new traction for the American market, being Electro-Motive’s first new passenger equipment in over a decade. Meeting the latest in emissions standards, Metrolink’s message was decidedly green, with the stylish streamlining being inspired by European loco designs.

Turn tail with the twinned Rotem Commuter Cars, complete with a cab car allowing for push-pull operations in the termini of LA Union Station and Lancaster. Double decker in form, and just as bold as the F125, they make for a potent and effective mix for the dense LA suburbs and rural Soledad Canyon.

Experience the challenge of mountain pass railroading combined with the timetable pressures of commuter passenger duties. Tackle the likes of Newhall Pass and wind your way through Los Angeles County while keeping to the schedule – but also take a moment to enjoy the stunning views on long, sun-soaked runs from either the head end or cab car.

Marvel at the stunning Californian scenery, and muscle 285,000 lb of hefty diesel machinery with Train Sim World: Antelope Valley Line: Los Angeles – Lancaster!

Key Features


  • 75-mile Antelope Valley Line, from LA Union Station to Lancaster, right up to date including Vista Canyon station
  • EMD F125 diesel locomotive in Metrolink livery
  • Hyundai Rotem Commuter Trailers and Cab Car in Metrolink livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • A variety of Scenarios and an authentic Timetable
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 9.1 GB
